Package Controller

Class Summary
AlignmentSelectListener This ActionListener listens to the user selection of the Alignment Tool in the JComboBox.
BLASTListener This ActionListener listens to the Align button on Alignment Panel.
BLASTTabListener This ChangeListener listens to tabs changing on the Alignment Panel.
Controller The Controller class created here with access to the ModelInterface and a View.
GroupListener This GroupListener listens to the Add, Remove, Next and Back buttons in the Grouping panel.
InputFileParser This InputFileParser listens to the PreProcess button in the Summary panel.
InputFileSelectionListener This ActionListener listens to the input file selected from the JFileChooser.
InputIDSelectionListener This ActionListener listens to the mouse selection on InputIDSelection panel
InputRegionSelectionListener This ActionListener listens to the user selection of the region.
InputTabChangeListener This ChangeListener listens for the user changing the top tabs on Input tab.
ModeSelectListener The class listens to the Pre-Processing Flow and the Alignment Flow buttons.
PairedEndListener This ChangeListener listens for the user selecting the paired end checkbox.
ParametersListener This class listens to the textboxes where the quality thresholds are entered and the next and back buttons.
QualityListener This class listens to the textboxes where the quality thresholds are entered and the next and back buttons.
RefBLASTRegionSelectionListener This class is responsible for listening to the Back button displayed on the BLAST Region screen.
RefColumnHeaderChooserListener The class is responsible for storing the header selected by the user to appear in the output .
ReferenceFileParser ReferenceFileParser is the class which will parse Reference Files.
ReferenceHeaderParser The class is reponsible for extracting column names of the selected reference files.
ReferenceHeaderSelectionListener The class listens to Column Header Selection tab which is in the Reference Files tab.
ReferenceTabChangeListener The class is resposible for listening and executing actions when the user changes to the reference tab.
RefFileSelectionListener The class retrieves the reference files selected by the user.
TagFilePreprocessListener The class is responsible for calling functions from the Model package to pre-process data and create tag files.
